mutants.original_line: cosine_sim = dot_product / np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)  # Cosine similarity calculation
mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_similarity(x, w):
    x_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(x, 2), axis=1))
    w_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(w, 2), axis=0))
    dot_product = np.dot(x, w)
    cosine_sim = dot_product * np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)
    return cosine_sim

import numpy as np

def calculate_similarity(x, w):
    x_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(x, 2), axis=1))
    w_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(w, 2), axis=0))
    dot_product = np.dot(x, w)
    cosine_sim = dot_product // np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)
    return cosine_sim

import numpy as np

def calculate_similarity(x, w):
    x_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(x, 3), axis=1))
    w_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(w, 2), axis=0))
    dot_product = np.dot(x, w)
    cosine_sim = dot_product / np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)
    return cosine_sim

def calculate_similarity(x, w):
    x_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(x, -2), axis=1))
    w_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(w, 2), axis=0))
    dot_product = np.dot(x, w)
    cosine_sim = dot_product / np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)
    return cosine_sim

def calculate_similarity(x, w):
    x_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(x, 2), axis=-1))
    w_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(w, 2), axis=0))
    dot_product = np.dot(x, w)
    cosine_sim = dot_product / np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)
    return cosine_sim

import numpy as np

def calculate_similarity(x, w):
    x_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(x, 2), axis=1))
    w_modulus = np.sqrt(np.sum(np.power(w, 2), axis=1))
    dot_product = np.dot(x, w)
    cosine_sim = dot_product / np.outer(x_modulus, w_modulus)
    return cosine_sim
